name: Wixom
description: Wixom is a growing community in Oakland County known for its family-friendly neighborhoods and easy access to I-96.

name: Novi
description: Novi is one of Metro Detroit's fastest-growing cities, featuring excellent schools, shopping, and modern residential developments.

name: Milford
description: Milford offers small-town charm with a historic downtown, close proximity to Kensington Metropark, and a strong sense of community.

name: Commerce Township
description: Commerce Township is known for its beautiful lakes, outdoor recreation opportunities, and growing residential communities.

name: South Lyon
description: South Lyon is a charming community with a vibrant downtown, excellent schools, and a strong commitment to preserving its small-town character.
